description:
## Student Identity Profile

What you'll find here:
- student profile
- employer profile
- employer pages
- settings & privacy
- documents

Other Student Identity Group Dashboards
- [[Squad][Identity] Identity Mini Service](https://app.datadoghq.com/dashboard/8px-2mb-674/squadidentity-identity-mini-service?from_ts=1650631530318&to_ts=1650635130318&live=true)
title: [Squad]Humans] Portfolio

definition.title: Requests and Errors on Next::Student::Users#show & update
[Mobile] User: Error % (100 * errors / hits), resource Mobile::V1
[Mobile] Destroy Organization Experience: % of Time Spent by service (all mobile services) on service handshake… in env production
Student Profile Endpoint Hits, Latency and DB Queries

queries.name: query2
queries.query: min:handshake.stu.controllers.query_count{region:us-central1 AND env:production AND controller_path:next/student/user* OR controller_path:next/student/employer* OR controller_path:next/student/documents*} by {action,controller,controller_path}

queries.name: query1
queries.query: max:handshake.stu.controllers.query_count{region:us-central1 AND env:production AND controller_path:next/student/user* OR controller_path:next/student/employer* OR controller_path:next/student/documents*} by {action,controller,controller_path}

queries.name: query3
queries.query: avg:handshake.stu.controllers.query_count{region:us-central1 AND env:production AND controller_path:next/student/user* OR controller_path:next/student/employer* OR controller_path:next/student/documents*} by {action,controller,controller_path}

queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:trace.rack.request{service:handshake AND resource_name:next::stu* AND env:production AND resource_name:next::student::userscontroller* OR resource_name:next::student::documentscontroller* OR resource_name:next::student::employerscontroller* OR resource_name:next::student::skills* OR resource_name::next::student::organizationmembershipscontroller* OR resource_name::next::student::workexperiences* OR resource_name:next::student::education*} by {resource_name}

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.hits{service:handshake AND resource_name:next::stu* AND env:production AND resource_name:next::student::userscontroller* OR resource_name:next::student::documentscontroller* OR resource_name:next::student::employerscontroller* OR resource_name:next::student::skills* OR resource_name::next::student::organizationmembershipscontroller* OR resource_name::next::student::workexperiences* OR resource_name:next::student::education*} by {resource_name}.as_count()
